import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' class Cameras extends Component { state = { cameras: [ { "id": "1", "image": "https://sm.mashable.com/t/mashable_sea/news/s/security-c/security-camera-captures-creepy-creature-and-everyone-has-a_8rw4.1200.png", "name": "Night Cam", "type": "infrared", "location": "Room 34", "_rid": "59UBANW67qwBAAAAAAAAAA==", "_self": "dbs/59UBAA==/colls/59UBANW67qw=/docs/59UBANW67qwBAAAAAAAAAA==/", "_etag": "\"0c01e5b5-0000-0700-0000-5ee17bf40000\"", "_attachments": "attachments/", "_ts": 1591835636 }, { "id": "2", "image": "https://sm.mashable.com/t/mashable_sea/news/s/security-c/security-camera-captures-creepy-creature-and-everyone-has-a_8rw4.1200.png", "name": "Thermo Cam", "type": "Heat", "location": "Drive Way", "_rid": "59UBANW67qwCAAAAAAAAAA==", "_self": "dbs/59UBAA==/colls/59UBANW67qw=/docs/59UBANW67qwCAAAAAAAAAA==/", "_etag": "\"0c0108b4-0000-0700-0000-5ee17bc10000\"", "_attachments": "attachments/", "_ts": 1591835585 } ] } componentDidMount() { axios.get(`https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users`) .then(res => { const cameras = res.data; this.setState({ cameras }); }) } render() { return (
